title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
**Product Listing:** 

Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit in sleek black, brought to you by ZEBRA. This versatile and high-performance scanner is perfect for various use cases in the retail and hospitality industries.

With its ergonomic design and lightweight construction, this handheld scanner ensures comfortable and efficient operation. The scanner features an omni-directional scanning capability, allowing for quick and accurate barcode scanning from any angle. 

This kit includes a presentation cradle and USB kit, providing convenient charging and connectivity options. The scanner can be easily connected to compatible devices such as laptops and desktops using the included USB cable. 

The power source options for this scanner are flexible, as it can be powered by corded electric, a USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries. This ensures that you can use the scanner in any environment without worrying about running out of power.

Equipped with a 1D/2D imager, this scanner is capable of reading both 1D and 2D barcodes, making it suitable for a wide range of scanning tasks. 

The Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit is pre-configured for easy setup and use. Additionally, it comes with auto-host cables, further simplifying the installation process.

Choose the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit for a reliable and efficient scanning solution in your business. Order now and streamline your operations with this top-of-the-line scanner.

Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit in Black by ZEBRA. This versatile and efficient kit is perfect for a variety of uses in the retail and hospitality industries. 

Compatible with both laptops and desktops, this kit offers multiple power sources, including corded electric, a USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries. The ergonomic design and lightweight construction make it comfortable to use for extended periods of time. 

Featuring a 1D/2D imager scanner type, this kit is capable of scanning a wide range of barcodes and QR codes with ease. The omni-directional scanning feature ensures quick and accurate scanning from any angle. 

With pre-configured settings and auto-host cables, this kit is ready to use right out of the box. The aim line guidance feature helps you accurately target your scans, while the presentation cradle keeps your scanner securely in place when not in use. 

Upgrade your scanning capabilities with the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit in Black from ZEBRA.
